lead_paragraph: New Zealand coach Mike Hesson has criticised his players' decision-making in India after the one-day side were thrashed in the final match of the tour.

headline.print_headline: New Zealand Coach Hesson Laments Poor Decision-Making in India
headline.main: New Zealand Coach Hesson Laments Poor Decision-Making in India

snippet: New Zealand coach Mike Hesson has criticised his players' decision-making in India after the one-day side were thrashed in the final match of the tour....
